page.title: 15Housing around Langho
page.content: Old housing in the area is related entirely to farming ; larger farm houses with small labourers cottages . There were subsequent develovments of terraced cottages for workers in small mills or in quarring . Now a majority of cottages have been improved to become homes for commuters . Most of the early housing is of stone , the cottages frequently being of the 2 up 2 down type , well finished at the front but often of random stone at the rear . Since 1950 a mixture of "middle class " housing has being built , virtually all privately owned and of a variety of types , much of it on small estates . Dwellings range from standard smallhouse types to individually designed properties .
